value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 02: Power BI Reporting - Part 1
value.excerpt: In this video, we introduce Power BI, and contrast Power BI reporting with paginated reporting. value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 20: Beyond Report Development - Part 1
value.excerpt: In this video, we describe how to publish reports to the Power BI service, and also cover consuming, delivering, and embedding paginated reports. Finally, we discuss when it's a good choice to create a paginated report instead of a Power BI report.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 25: December 2020 Update
